summary: Homer was an ancient Greek poet who wrote two famous epic poems, the Iliad and the Odyssey. These stories are about the Trojan War and a hero's journey home. Homer's work is really important because it taught people in ancient Greece about heroism and honor. Many scholars believe he lived around the 8th century BCE. Even though some stories say he was blind, experts think these are just legends. His poems are still super popular and have inspired lots of art, music, and books.
title: Homer
